name: ZPack: Random Maps for ZDoom
summary: ZPack - Random Maps for ZDoom is a 2008 megawad by members of the ZDoom community which contains 30 levels, divided into three 10 map episodes. It requires ZDoom 2.2.0 or later to play (or alternatively, GZDoom 1.1.0 or later). Although the maps are divided into episodes and use the ExMx lump name scheme, the wad is for the Doom II IWAD.

name: ZP2KX: Zombies and Pterodactyls 20XX
summary: ZP2KX: Zombies and Pterodactyls 20XX is a multiplayer-focused shooter and the sequel to ZP2K9. The background scenario is that pterodactyls arrange deadly matches between humans and zombies. Features a standard deathmatch, team deathmatch, King of the Hill and Capture the Flag modes, as well as a special Zombie Hunt.

name: ZpellCatz
summary: ZpellCatz is an action RPG with spell casting cats. Players can explore an island with lots of randomly generated dungeons, level up and find loot.

name: ZPF
summary: ZPF is a retro-inspired horizontal shooter for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Blast your way through a cosmic gauntlet of epic boss battles, addictive scoring, and hidden secrets in a thrilling arcade-style adventure through fantasy, sci-fi, and alien-themed worlds.

name: ZPC
summary: Famous for its art design by Aidan Hughes of KMFDM album-cover fame, ZPC is a first person shooter using the Marathon 2 engine. The plot of the game involves the player, a messiah-like figure, bringing down a totalitarian dictatorship.

name: Zpeciation: Tough Days (TD)
summary:
Zpeciation TD is a successor of the classic Tower Defence genre in the post-apocalyptic setting. You are a leader of mercenaries serving the newly founded military power. 18 types of monsters, 8 unique maps, 8 types of weapons and 1 story.
This game is sure to be enjoyed by the Tower Defence genre fans.

name: ZPlague
summary: Armed militaries are requested to clean an area infested by zombies. On each round you don't now if you will be a zombie or a soldier, so use the skills or items that was given to you and keep alert.

name: ZpellCatz: Supporter Pack
summary: Do you like ZpellCatz and would you like to continue supporting its development? Then the Supporter Pack is just right for you. Receive a selection of headdresses and an exclusive Familiar as a thank you.

name: ZP2K9
summary: ZP2K9 is an XNA community game.
